sourcesContent:
/* Login view from lazygram in react */ import { lg_api } from "../../__modules__"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function Profile() { // State const [profile, setProfile] = useState(""); async function getProfile() { // Get user. const cookie = document.cookie; let user_id; let data; if (cookie !== "") { user_id = cookie .split(";") .find((e) => e.startsWith("user_id=")) .split("=")[1]; data = await lg_api("accounts/profile-router/profile-router/", { params: { user_id: user_id, }, }); } setProfile({data}) } return(
{{does_not_profile}} Do you want to create profile?
{/* */}

{profile.user.username} Edit profile {/* Follow */}

{profile.posts_count}785 posts
{profile.followers}1,401 followers
{profile.following}491 following

{profile.biography}

Website: {profile.website}

{/* {% for post in posts %} */}
) } export { Profile };
